trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The bullywug can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
entries: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bullywug makes two Bog Staff attacks. It can replace any attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast {@spell Ray of Sickness|XPHB}.

action.name: Bog Staff
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Poison damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bullywug casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks):
